text: Eteke sihamte yadi tomara ahbanata samharai nidiye, tente jani thoraa, sihamte kerala nijara kamana-basanarahe anusarana karae. Arau yiye allahara patha nirdesa agraahya karai nijara kamana-basanara anusarana karae se'ijanatakai adhika bibhraanta arau kona haâ€™ba parae? Niscaya allahe yalima sampradayaka hidayata nakarae
